author: Staff Reporter
text:
Judicial Magistrate K. Kavitha adjourned a case relating to a group clash till April 29 here on Thursday. Tamizhaga Makkal Munnetra Kazhagam leader John Pandian, one of the accused in this case, did not appear in the court.

The prosecution said that a large number of persons blocked Dindigul-Theni Highway near Sempatti Roundtana in 1993 during a protest against the removal of the statue of ‘Tyagi’ Katta Karuppu Kudumban from the spot.

Meanwhile, an unruly mob engaged in violent activities and damaged public properties.

Cases were registered against 300 persons, including Mr. John Pandian, in this connection.
title: Case against John Pandian adjourned till April 29
